name: Bloxorz HD
description:
Bloxorz HD is a puzzle game, very challenging. It is a great block awesome game that gets harder at each progressive level. You control a 6-sided two-story block through tiled floors. Flip the block over this way and over that way to get it to fall in the hole.
How to Play:
Control the block around the world, use the left, right, up and down arrow keys.
